CS_Assault_Lith:
	
CS_Assault Remake for CS:Source!!!!!




INSTALLATION:
------------------------------------------
Extract this .zip into your your 

"C:\Program Files\Valve\Steam\SteamApps\"Source E-mail"\counter-strike source\cstrike\"

It will ask you to overwrite some files, just say yes, it only says this because of the 
folders that are being extracted.





MAP INFO:
------------------------------------------

Build Time:
'bout 5 days from start to finish



Compile time:
11 minutes or so



Textures:
All HL2 Textures



Models:
All HL2 Models



Bugs:
Cannot take the hostages out of the back door.
i'm not sure exactly how to make this work.
